title: 伊拉克议会推动反美，库尔德族独立此其时矣？
contents:
via Twitter @lifetimeuscn

今天在伊拉克議會表決要求美國撤離伊拉克的議案時，庫爾德人和遜尼派議員並沒有投票，議會也沒有取得議案通過必須的法定票數。近日，有美國議員提出讓庫爾德人獨立建國，以箝制什葉派占多數的伊拉克完全倒向伊朗。但是，川普過不了埃爾多安這一關。很多美國人批評川普過於遷就埃爾多安。


via Twitter Marco Rubio 

Maybe it’s time for a fully independent #Kurdistan in what is currently Northern #Iraq?

Important information under reported in Western media about “vote” to expel US from #Iraq

Appears Kurdish & Sunni blocs in parliament boycotted the session.

If true it doesn’t just reveal sectarian divide over U.S. presence, it prevents quorum needed for vote to be binding.
